Author: littlemissbones
Text: I didn’t poop for like 5 days when I’m usually pretty regular (I use prescription lax)! I think it’s because they’re so dense and you aren’t probably supposed to have the fiber flour in such large quantities   Thanks!

Author: Zoe_nuclear_kitten
Text: Honestly its just probably because oats are a pretty dence food, they make you feel full for a long amount of time and as a result if you havent "gone" yet may make you feel a little weighed down, its just the food still inside your body, don't worry about it! On another side it could just be your ed trying to mess with you
